fields.content:
Hai **Schematroops!** Selamat datang di portal **[Schematics NPC Junior 2021](https://schematics.its.ac.id/sch-npc/portal/junior/)**. Platform ini akan digunakan sebagai platform tutorial hingga babak final pada **[Schematics NPC Junior 2021](https://schematics.its.ac.id/sch-npc/portal/junior/)**. Apabila terdapat pertanyaan silahkan ditanyakan melalui Discord Schematics NPC 2021.

Jangan lupa, ikuti juga sosial media [Schematics 2021](https://schematics.its.ac.id) :

Twitter : [@schematics_its](https://twitter.com/schematics_its)

Instagram : [@schematics.its](https://www.instagram.com/schematics.its)

Facebook : [Schematics HMTC ITS-Surabaya](https://www.facebook.com/schematicshmtc)

YouTube : [Schematics ITS Surabaya](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCry-PhEw0TWERzp69HeRFpA)

LinkedIn : [Schematics ITS](https://www.linkedin.com/company/schematicsits)

LINE : [Schematics ITS](https://line.me/R/ti/p/%40qie3870y)

TikTok : [@schematics.its](https://www.tiktok.com/@schematics.its?lang=id)

Have a nice day, **Schematroops!**
fields.title: Selamat datang di Schematics NPC Junior 2021
